message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $11000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9500 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm counteroffering at $10200. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However, $10200 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9800. I'm sure we can find a solution that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9800 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm counteroffering at $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into it.
